00018 HierarchyItem::HierarchyItem(LibraryInterface* handler,
00019                                                          HierarchyItem* parent, 
00020                                                          VLNV* vlnvP ):
00021 QObject(parent),
00022 component_(),
00023 busDef_(),
00024 absDef_(),
00025 handler_(handler),
00026 childItems_(),
00027 parentItem_(parent),
00028 isValid_(true),
00029 isDuplicate_(false),
00030 type_(HierarchyItem::ROOT) {
00031 
00032         Q_ASSERT_X(handler, "HierarchyItem constructor",
00033                 "Null LibraryInterface pointer given as parameter");
00034         Q_ASSERT_X(vlnvP, "HierarchyItem constructor",
00035                 "Invalid VLNV given as parameter");
00036         Q_ASSERT_X(parent, "HierarchyItem constructor",
00037                 "Null parent pointer given as parameter");
00038 
00039         VLNV vlnv = *vlnvP;
00040 
00041         connect(this, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00042                 parent, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00043         connect(this, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00044                 parent, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00045 
00046 
00047         if (handler_->getDocumentType(vlnv) == VLNV::COMPONENT) {
00048                 parseComponent(vlnv);
00049         }
00050         else if (handler_->getDocumentType(vlnv) == VLNV::BUSDEFINITION) {
00051                 parseBusDefinition(vlnv);
00052         }
00053         else if (handler_->getDocumentType(vlnv) == VLNV::ABSTRACTIONDEFINITION) {
00054                 parseAbsDefinition(vlnv);
00055         }
00056         else {
00057                 emit errorMessage(tr("VLNV %1:%2:%3:%4 was not for supported item").arg(
00058                         vlnv.getVendor()).arg(
00059                         vlnv.getLibrary()).arg(
00060                         vlnv.getName()).arg(
00061                         vlnv.getVersion()));
00062                 isValid_ = false;
00063                 return;
00064         }
00065 
00066         
00067 }

00069 HierarchyItem::HierarchyItem( LibraryInterface* handler, QObject* parent ):
00070 QObject(parent),
00071 component_(),
00072 handler_(handler),
00073 childItems_(),
00074 parentItem_(NULL),
00075 isValid_(true),
00076 isDuplicate_(false),
00077 type_(HierarchyItem::ROOT) {
00078 }

00080 void HierarchyItem::parseComponent( const VLNV& vlnv ) {
00081 
00082         type_ = HierarchyItem::COMPONENT;
00083 
00084         // parse the component model
00085         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = handler_->getModel(vlnv);
00086         component_ = libComp.staticCast<Component>();
00087 
00088         // ask the hierarchical references from the component
00089         QList<VLNV> refs = component_->getHierRefs();
00090         foreach (VLNV ref, refs) {
00091 
00092                 VLNV reference = ref;
00093                 reference.setType(handler_->getDocumentType(ref));
00094 
00095                 // make sure the library contains the vlnv
00096                 if (!handler_->contains(reference)) {
00097                         emit errorMessage(tr("VLNV %1:%2:%3:%4 was not found in library").arg(
00098                                 reference.getVendor()).arg(
00099                                 reference.getLibrary()).arg(
00100                                 reference.getName()).arg(
00101                                 reference.getVersion()));
00102                         isValid_ = false;
00103                         continue;
00104                 }
00105 
00106                 QSharedPointer<Design> design;
00107 
00108                 // parse the library item
00109                 QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> temp = handler_->getModel(reference);
00110 
00111                 // if the reference was for design configuration
00112                 if (handler_->getDocumentType(reference) == VLNV::DESIGNCONFIGURATION) {
00113 
00114                         QSharedPointer<DesignConfiguration> desConf = temp.dynamicCast<DesignConfiguration>();
00115 
00116                         VLNV designVLNV = desConf->getDesignRef();
00117                         designVLNV.setType(VLNV::DESIGN);
00118 
00119                         if (!handler_->contains(designVLNV) || 
00120                                 handler_->getDocumentType(designVLNV) != VLNV::DESIGN) {
00121                                         emit errorMessage(tr("Design %1:%2:%3:%4 was not found in library").arg(
00122                                                 reference.getVendor()).arg(
00123                                                 reference.getLibrary()).arg(
00124                                                 reference.getName()).arg(
00125                                                 reference.getVersion()));
00126                                         isValid_ = false;
00127                                         continue;
00128                         }
00129 
00130                         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> desTemp = handler_->getModel(designVLNV);
00131                         design = desTemp.dynamicCast<Design>();
00132                 }
00133 
00134                 // if hierarchy reference was directly for design
00135                 else if (handler_->getDocumentType(reference) == VLNV::DESIGN) {
00136 
00137                         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> desTemp = handler_->getModel(reference);
00138                         design = desTemp.dynamicCast<Design>();
00139                 }
00140 
00141                 // if the hierarhy reference was not for design or design configuration
00142                 else {
00143                         emit errorMessage(tr("VLNV %1:%2:%3:%4 was not valid hierarchy reference").arg(
00144                                 reference.getVendor()).arg(
00145                                 reference.getLibrary()).arg(
00146                                 reference.getName()).arg(
00147                                 reference.getVersion()));
00148                         isValid_ = false;
00149                         continue;
00150                 }
00151 
00152                 Q_ASSERT_X(design, "HierarchyItem constructor",
00153                         "Invalid design pointer");
00154 
00155                 // take all components referenced by the design
00156                 QList<VLNV> components = design->getComponents();
00157                 foreach (VLNV compVLNV, components) {
00158 
00159                         if (!handler_->contains(compVLNV)) {
00160                                 emit errorMessage(tr("VLNV %1:%2:%3:%4 was not found in library").arg(
00161                                         compVLNV.getVendor()).arg(
00162                                         compVLNV.getLibrary()).arg(
00163                                         compVLNV.getName()).arg(
00164                                         compVLNV.getVersion()));
00165 
00166                                 // mark this object as invalid because not all items were found
00167                                 isValid_ = false;
00168                                 continue;
00169                         }
00170 
00171                         else if (handler_->getDocumentType(compVLNV) != VLNV::COMPONENT) {
00172                                 emit errorMessage(tr("VLNV %1:%2:%3:%4 was not for component").arg(
00173                                         compVLNV.getVendor()).arg(
00174                                         compVLNV.getLibrary()).arg(
00175                                         compVLNV.getName()).arg(
00176                                         compVLNV.getVersion()));
00177 
00178                                 // mark this object as invalid because not all items were found
00179                                 isValid_ = false;
00180                                 continue;
00181                         }
00182 
00183                         else if (getVLNV() == compVLNV || hasParent(compVLNV)) {
00184                                 emit errorMessage(tr("Cyclic instantiation for vlnv %1:%2:%3:%4 was found").arg(
00185                                         compVLNV.getVendor()).arg(
00186                                         compVLNV.getLibrary()).arg(
00187                                         compVLNV.getName()).arg(
00188                                         compVLNV.getVersion()));
00189                                 isValid_ = false;
00190                                 continue;
00191                         }
00192 
00193                         // if item already has a child with given VLNV then don't create duplicate.
00194                         if (hasChild(compVLNV))
00195                                 continue;
00196 
00197                         VLNV* temp = handler_->getOriginalPointer(compVLNV);
00198 
00199                         // create a child item that matches the referenced component
00200                         HierarchyItem* item = new HierarchyItem(handler_, this, temp);
00201                         connect(item, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00202                                 this, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00203                         connect(item, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00204                                 this, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00205                         childItems_.append(item);
00206                 }
00207         }
00208 }

00210 void HierarchyItem::parseBusDefinition( const VLNV& vlnv ) {
00211         type_ = HierarchyItem::BUSDEFINITION;
00212 
00213         // parse the bus definition model
00214         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = handler_->getModel(vlnv);
00215         busDef_ = libComp.staticCast<BusDefinition>();
00216 }
00217 
00218 void HierarchyItem::parseAbsDefinition( const VLNV& vlnv ) {
00219         type_ = HierarchyItem::ABSDEFINITION;
00220 
00221         // parse the abstraction definition model
00222         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = handler_->getModel(vlnv);
00223         absDef_ = libComp.staticCast<AbstractionDefinition>();
00224 }

00226 void HierarchyItem::createChild(VLNV* vlnv ) {
00227         // make sure the item is the root
00228 //      Q_ASSERT_X(!parentItem_, "HierarchyItem::createChild()",
00229 //              "createChild was called for non-root item");
00230 
00231         // if item already has a child for given vlnv
00232         if (hasChild(*vlnv))
00233                 return;
00234 
00235         HierarchyItem* item = new HierarchyItem(handler_, this, vlnv);
00236         childItems_.append(item);
00237 }

00242 VLNV HierarchyItem::getVLNV() const {
00243         if (type_ == HierarchyItem::COMPONENT && component_)
00244                 return *component_->getVlnv();
00245         else if (type_ == HierarchyItem::BUSDEFINITION && busDef_)
00246                 return *busDef_->getVlnv();
00247         else if (type_ == HierarchyItem::ABSDEFINITION && absDef_)
00248                 return *absDef_->getVlnv();
00249         return VLNV();
00250 }

00252 HierarchyItem* HierarchyItem::child( int index ) const {
00253         if (index >= 0 && index < childItems_.size())
00254                 return childItems_[index];
00255         
00256         return 0;
00257 }

00259 int HierarchyItem::row() {
00260         if (parentItem_)
00261                 return parentItem_->childItems_.indexOf(this);
00262 
00263         return -1;
00264 }

00267         return childItems_.size();

00271         return childItems_.indexOf(item);

00290 bool HierarchyItem::hasChild( const VLNV& vlnv ) {
00291 
00292         foreach (HierarchyItem* item, childItems_) {
00293                 if (item->getVLNV() == vlnv)
00294                         return true;
00295         }
00296         return false;
00297 }

00299 bool HierarchyItem::contains( const VLNV& vlnv ) const {
00300         // if this component matches the vlnv
00301         if (component_ && *component_->getVlnv() == vlnv)
00302                 return true;
00303 
00304         // if bus definition matches the vlnv
00305         else if (busDef_ && *busDef_->getVlnv() == vlnv)
00306                 return true;
00307 
00308         // if abstraction definition matches the vlnv
00309         else if (absDef_ && *absDef_->getVlnv() == vlnv)
00310                 return true;
00311 
00312         // ask the children if they have the vlnv
00313         foreach (HierarchyItem* item, childItems_) {
00314                 if (item->contains(vlnv))
00315                         return true;
00316         }
00317         return false;
00318 }
00319 
00320 void HierarchyItem::cleanUp() {
00321 
00322         // make sure this is called only for root item
00323         Q_ASSERT_X(!component_, "HierarchyItem::cleanUp",
00324                 "Function was called for non-root item");
00325 
00326         QList<HierarchyItem*> itemsToRemove;
00327 
00328         // check the vlnv of each item
00329         foreach (HierarchyItem* item, childItems_) {
00330                 // the vlnv to search
00331                 VLNV vlnv = item->getVLNV();
00332 
00333                 foreach (HierarchyItem* item2, childItems_) {
00334                         
00335                         // if item is not the same but contains the other one and the other
00336                         // is not yet on the list to be removed
00337                         if (item != item2 && item2->contains(vlnv) && !itemsToRemove.contains(item2)) {
00338                                 
00339                                 item->setDuplicate(true);
00340 
00341                                 break;
00342                         }
00343                 }
00344         }
00345 }

00348         return component_;

00351 VLNV* HierarchyItem::getVLNVPointer() const {
00352         return handler_->getOriginalPointer(getVLNV());

00355 int HierarchyItem::referenceCount(const VLNV& vlnv) const {
00356         int count = 0;
00357 
00358         // add the reference count of all child items.
00359         foreach (HierarchyItem* item, childItems_) {
00360                 
00361                 // if item itself matches the vlnv and this item is not the root.
00362                 // root must be excluded because it has all items as it's children so 
00363                 // the real count does not include direct children of root
00364                 if (parentItem_ && item->getVLNV() == vlnv)
00365                         ++count;
00366                 
00367                 // tell item to search it's children
00368                 else
00369                         count += item->referenceCount(vlnv);
00370         }
00371         return count;
00372 }
00373 
00374 int HierarchyItem::getOwners( QList<VLNV>& list, const VLNV& vlnvToSearch ) const {
00375 
00376         foreach (HierarchyItem* item, childItems_) {
00377                 
00378                 // if item itself matches the vlnv and this item is not the root.
00379                 // root must be excluded because it has all items as it's children so 
00380                 // the real count does not include direct children of root
00381                 // also make sure the vlnvs are appended only once
00382                 if (parentItem_ && item->getVLNV() == vlnvToSearch && !list.contains(getVLNV()))
00383                         list.append(getVLNV());
00384 
00385                 // tell item to search it's children
00386                 else
00387                         item->getOwners(list, vlnvToSearch);
00388         }
00389         return list.size();
00390 }
00391 
00392 int HierarchyItem::removeItems( const VLNV& vlnv ) {
00393         
00394         QList<HierarchyItem*> childrenToRemove;
00395 
00396         // check each child
00397         foreach (HierarchyItem* item, childItems_) {
00398                 
00399                 // if item has the vlnv then it should be removed
00400                 if (item->getVLNV() == vlnv) 
00401                         childrenToRemove.append(item);
00402 
00403                 // otherwise tell item to check it's own children
00404                 else
00405                         item->removeItems(vlnv);
00406         }
00407 
00408         int count = childrenToRemove.size();
00409 
00410         // remove the children that were marked to be removed.
00411         foreach (HierarchyItem* item, childrenToRemove) {
00412 
00413                 int index = childItems_.indexOf(item);
00414                 delete item;
00415                 childItems_.removeAt(index);
00416 
00417                 // if at least one item is removed then item is no longer valid 
00418                 // because the design contains references to item that are not in the
00419                 // library. If type is not component then this of course remains valid.
00420                 if (type_ == HierarchyItem::COMPONENT)
00421                         isValid_ = false;
00422         }
00423 
00424         return count;
00425 }
00426 
00427 QList<HierarchyItem*> HierarchyItem::findItems( const VLNV& vlnv ) {
00428         QList<HierarchyItem*> items;
00429 
00430         if (getVLNV() == vlnv)
00431                 items.append(this);
00432 
00433         foreach (HierarchyItem* item, childItems_) {
00434                 items += item->findItems(vlnv);
00435         }
00436         return items;
00437 }
00438 
00439 void HierarchyItem::updateItems( const VLNV& vlnv ) {
00440         // remove direct children with given vlnv
00441         int count = removeItems(vlnv);
00442 
00443         // tell remaining children to update their children if needed
00444         foreach (HierarchyItem* item, childItems_) {
00445                 item->updateItems(vlnv);
00446         }
00447 
00448         // if at least one child item was removed then create it again.
00449         if (count > 0) {
00450 
00451                 VLNV* vlnvP = handler_->getOriginalPointer(vlnv);
00452 
00453                 // if a child was removed then create a new child for the component
00454                 HierarchyItem* item = new HierarchyItem(handler_, this, vlnvP);
00455                 childItems_.append(item);
00456         }
00457 }
00458 
00459 bool HierarchyItem::hasParent( const VLNV& vlnv ) {
00460         
00461         // if this is not root
00462         if (parentItem_) {
00463 
00464                 // if item itself has the vlnv
00465                 if (parentItem_->getVLNV() == vlnv)
00466                         return true;
00467 
00468                 return parentItem_->hasParent(vlnv);
00469         }
00470         // if root item and match was not found.
00471         else
00472                 return false;
00473 }
00474 
00475 QList<VLNV> HierarchyItem::getVLNVs() const {
00476         QList<VLNV> list;
00477         
00478         // if this is not root item
00479         if (parentItem_) {
00480 
00481                 // add this vlnv to the list
00482                 list.append(getVLNV());
00483 
00484                 // append parent item's list of vlnvs
00485                 list += parentItem_->getVLNVs();
00486                 return list;
00487         }
00488         // if was root item this does not contain VLNVs
00489         else 
00490                 return list;
00491 }

00493 bool HierarchyItem::isRoot() const {
00494         if (!parentItem_)
00495                 return true;
00496         else
00497                 return false;

00528 void HierarchyItem::getChildren( QList<VLNV>& childList, const VLNV& owner ) {
00529 
00530         // make sure this is called only for root item
00531         Q_ASSERT_X(!component_, "HierarchyItem::cleanUp",
00532                 "Function was called for non-root item");
00533 
00534         // search each child item
00535         foreach (HierarchyItem* item, childItems_) {
00536 
00537                 // if child matches the owner
00538                 if (item->getVLNV() == owner) {
00539 
00540                         // ask child to append it's children
00541                         item->getChildItems(childList);
00542                         break;
00543                 }
00544         }
00545 }
00546 
00547 void HierarchyItem::getChildItems( QList<VLNV>& itemList ) {
00548 
00549         // go through each child item
00550         foreach (HierarchyItem* item, childItems_) {
00551 
00552                 // if child's vlnv is not yet on the list
00553                 if (!itemList.contains(item->getVLNV()))
00554                         itemList.append(item->getVLNV());
00555 
00556                 // ask child to add its' children
00557                 item->getChildItems(itemList);
00558         }
00559 }

00566 KactusAttribute::SWType HierarchyItem::getSoftwareType() const {
00567         // make sure item is software item
00568         Q_ASSERT(getImplementation() == KactusAttribute::KTS_SW);
00569         return component_->getComponentSWType();

00572 
00573 KactusAttribute::BusDefType HierarchyItem::getBusDefType() {
00574         // make sure item is for bus def or abs def
00575         Q_ASSERT(busDef_ || absDef_);
00576 
00577         if (busDef_) {
00578                 return busDef_->getType();
00579         }
00580         else if (absDef_) {
00581                 VLNV busVLNV = absDef_->getBusType();
00582                 
00583                 // if the vlnv is not found
00584                 if (!handler_->contains(busVLNV)) {
00585                         emit errorMessage(tr("VLNV %1 referenced in abstraction definition %2"
00586                                 " was not found in library.").arg(busVLNV.toString()).arg(getVLNV().toString()));
00587                         return KactusAttribute::KTS_BUSDEF_HW;
00588                 }
00589 
00590                 // make sure the vlnv is for bus definition
00591                 if (handler_->getDocumentType(busVLNV) == VLNV::BUSDEFINITION) {
00592                         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = handler_->getModel(busVLNV);
00593                         QSharedPointer<BusDefinition> busDef = libComp.staticCast<BusDefinition>();
00594 
00595                         return busDef->getType();
00596                 }
00597                 // if vlnv was not for bus definition
00598                 else {
00599                         emit errorMessage(tr("VLNV %1 referenced in abstraction definition %2"
00600                                 " was not for bus definition").arg(busVLNV.toString()).arg(getVLNV().toString()));
00601                         return KactusAttribute::KTS_BUSDEF_HW;
00602                 }
00603         }
00604 
00605         Q_ASSERT(false);
00606         return KactusAttribute::KTS_BUSDEF_HW;
00607 }
